title: Attention all junglers.
body:
Stop A F K F A R M I N G, and then getting mad at your teammates who go 0/5 in lane from constant roams, ganks and tower dives. If you afk farm, surely you should realise its LITERALLY YOUR FAULT LOL? We aren't ALL PRO PLAYERS, dont expect your teammates to 1v3 every single time, especially when they're so far behind.

It has literally gotten to the point where I seriously have to main jungle just so i can win a single fucking game bahaha.

replies.body: dude, you did the least damage in the game... there are so many things i could tell you that you're doing wrong if i could spectate that game, god damn
schooled by plat4 oce when i finished last season diamond. interesting.
You're at 50% in mid Gold now tho? Last season is *last* season, and he's got a point, the full tank support had the same damage as you, as Yi. Losses are a team effort too m8.
also while im here youre jungler not ganking is NEVER a reason to go 0-5
